exposurecompensation: Can be adjusted by -5 to +5 EV in increments of 1/3 or 1/2 EV in P, S, A and M modes
storagetypes: SD / SDHC / SDXC (Compatible with UHS-I standard SDHC / SDXC Memory Cards)
metering: Centre weighted, Matrix, Spot (TTL exposure metering using 2,016-pixel RGB sensor)
flashmodes: Auto, auto with red-eye reduction, auto slow sync, auto slow sync with red-eye reduction, fill-flash, red-eye reduction, slow sync, slow sync with red-eye reduction, rear-curtain with slow sync, rear-curtain sync, off; auto FP high-speed sync supported
fileformat: Still Images: JPEG, RAW, TIFF Movies: MPEG-4 AVC/H.264, MOV Audio: Linear PCM
whitebalance: Auto (2 types), incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual (up to 4 values can be stored), choose color temperature (2,500 K to 10,000 K); all with fine-tuning
